flawed_nl_solution:
The age of Jeremy three years from now will be 40+3 = <<40+3=43>>43 years
Since Sebastian age is four years more than Jeremy's, Sebastian is currently 40+4 = 45 years.
In three years, Sebastian will be 45+3 = <<45+3=48>>48 years old
The total age of Jeremy and Sebastian in three years will be 48+43 = <<48+43=91>>91
If the total age of Jeremy, Sebastian and Sophia in three years is 150, then Sophia's age in three years will be 150-91 = <<150-91=59>>59

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 44, not 45. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
